import socket
	device_ip = socket.gethostbyname(socket.gethostname())
	device_ip = device_ip.replace("'","")
	clientIP = system.tag.read('[System]Client/Network/IPAddress').value
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer_Charts").getChild("FlexContainer_Top").getChild("IP").props.text = clientIP
	
	
	eqPath = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\Colombia\1100_ROTOGRABADO\RO2'
	query = 'select eqPath from smarttvs_config where hostname= ?'
	data = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[device_ip])
	if data.getRowCount() > 0:
		eqPath = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)[0]['eqPath']
	self.params.eqPath = eqPath
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh')
	return eqPath

host = value
	ip = system.db.runPrepQuery('SELECT eqPath,eqPath2,eqPath3 FROM smarttvs_config where hostname = ?',[host])
	if ip.getRowCount() !=0:
		eqPath = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ip)[0]['eqPath']
		eqPath2 = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ip)[0]['eqPath2']
		eqPath3 = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ip)[0]['eqPath3']
	else:
		eqPath = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\\Colombia\\1100_EXTRUSION\\EF5'
		eqPath2 = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\\Colombia\\1100_EXTRUSION\\EF6'
		eqPath3 = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\\Colombia\\1100_EXTRUSION\\EF7'
	
	if eqPath2 == '' or eqPath2 == None:
		eqPath2 = eqPath
		
	if eqPath3 == '' or eqPath3 == None:
		eqPath3 = eqPath
	
	self.params.eqPath0 = eqPath
	self.params.eqPath1 = eqPath2
	self.params.eqPath2 = eqPath3
	
	#get area
	self.params.area = eqPath.split("\\")[2]
	#system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh')
	return host

	# Para extrusión, mostrar ambas velocidades (M y Kg)
	if area == "EXTRUSION":

	area = value.split("\\")[2].split("_")[1]
	
	# Para extrusión, mostrar ambas velocidades (M y Kg)
	if area == "EXTRUSION":
		return "SmartTVs/Widgets/speedsMetersAndKg"
	else:

#	try:
	area = self.view.params.area
	filter = system.mes.object.filter.createFilter()
	filter.setMESObjectTypeName('Area')
	filter.setMESObjectNamePattern(area)
	listOfAreas = system.mes.searchMESObjects(filter)
	
	areaCode = listOfAreas[0].getName()
	
	areaPath = "MINIPAK_POLYBOL\\Colombia\\" + areaCode + "\\*"
			
	# Execute Analysis
	analysisName = "_oee_area"
	obj = system.mes.analysis.getMESAnalysisSettings(analysisName)
	end = self.view.custom.endDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.endDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
	start = self.view.custom.startOfMonth #system.date.parse(self.view.params.startDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
	params = {'areaPath' : areaPath}
	result = system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start, end, obj, params)
	data = result.getDataset()
	# Get OEE Data

#	availability = int(round( data.getValueAt(0, "OEE Availability") *100 ))

#	quality = int(round( data.getValueAt(0, "OEE Quality") *100 ))
	
	return data
